metadata.dcterms:title: Data Dictionary for fairness evaluation of an in-session dropout prediction model
metadata.dcterms:description: The data set and metadata information is provided to be able to understand the code of the fairness evaluation.
metadata.dcterms:creator: Nathalie Rzepka
metadata.dcterms:subject: Algorithmic Bias
metadata.dcterms:relation: N. Rzepka, K. Simbeck, H.-G. Müller, and N. Pinkwart Keep It Up: In-session Dropout Prediction to Support Blended Classroom Scenarios Proceedings of the 14th International Conference on Computer Supported Education - Volume 2: CSEDU, SciTePress, 2022, ISBN 978-989-758-562-3

Nathalie Rzepka, Katharina Simbeck, Hans G. Müller, and Niels Pinkwart. 2022. Fairness of In-session Dropout Prediction. In Proceedings of the 14th International Conference on Computer Supported Education. SCITEPRESS, 316–326. DOI: https://doi.org/10.5220/0010962100003182.
